mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rack where is_del=0) rackTotal, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_org where is_del=0) orgTotal, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM room where is_del=0) roomTotal, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM res WHERE is_del = 0 AND `status` = '1' ) deviceTotal, 1 level, ( SELECT COUNT(rt.id) FROM res_type rt where rt.is_del=0 ) 'deviceTypeTotal'

SELECT rs.region_id, DATE_FORMAT(rs.created_time, '%Y') year , sum( CASE WHEN rs.`status` = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) 'onlineTotal', sum( CASE WHEN rs.`status` = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) 'scrapTotal', count(rs.id) 'deviceTotal', sum( CASE WHEN rs.`status` = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) 'unknownTotal' FROM res rs LEFT JOIN sys_org so ON rs.org_id=so.id WHERE rs.is_del=0
AND so.full_code LIKE CONCAT('',#{fullCode},'%')
AND rs.region_id=#{regionId}
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(rs.created_time, '%Y')
